string-array.name: device_descriptions
string-array.item: A smart dog cam is a device that lets you monitor and interact with your pet remotely, using your phone. Some models can also dispense treats, play music, or pan around the room for a better view.

A smart doorbell is a device that alerts you when someone rings it, and lets you see and talk to the visitor using your phone. Some models can also record video, detect motion, or work with other smart devices.

A smart fridge is a device that connects to the internet and offers various features, such as displaying recipes, ordering groceries, playing music, or showing whatâ€™s inside without opening the door3.
A smart assistant is a device that uses artificial intelligence to answer your questions, control other smart devices, play music, set reminders, or perform other tasks using voice commands.

A smart lawn mower is a device that can cut your grass automatically, using sensors and GPS to navigate your yard. Some models can also be controlled by your phone, adjust to weather conditions, or return to their charging station when needed.

A smart light bulb is a device that can change its brightness, color, or schedule using your phone or voice commands. Some models can also sync with music, create scenes, or work with other smart devices.

A smart thermostat is a device that can adjust the temperature of your home automatically, using sensors and algorithms to learn your preferences. Some models can also be controlled by your phone or voice commands, save energy, or work with other smart devices.

A smart vacuum is a device that can clean your floors automatically, using sensors and cameras to avoid obstacles and map your home. Some models can also be controlled by your phone or voice commands, empty their own dustbin, or work with other smart devices.

A smart outdoor camera is a device that can capture high-quality photos and videos, and also perform various functions using artificial intelligence. Some examples of smart camera features are motion detection, face recognition, night vision, timestamp, filters, and voice control.
